description:
Around the year 2030, Earth has been linked to a parallel world of monsters and magic through a new collectible card game named Future Card Buddyfight. By using a Buddy Rare Card as a portal, normal humans can become partners with a monster and call upon them to battle other players in Buddyfights. As some humans choose to use the power of their Buddy to commit crimes, a law enforcement agency called the Buddy Police tracks down and confiscates the Decks of those who violate the law.
http://anidb.net/ch61174 [Mikado Gaou] is an eager young martial artist who becomes Buddies with the hot-blooded http://anidb.net/ch61173 [Drumbunker Dragon]. Receiving a Core Deck Case from http://anidb.net/ch61172 [Ryuuenji Tasuku], a Buddyfight prodigy working for the Buddy Police, he takes his first steps into the fantastic world of Buddyfight.
Source: TV Tropes

REGULAR.description:
When Gao Mikado opens a card package during writing class he gets a Buddy Rare Card called Drum Bunker Dragon.  Gao and Drum Buddy up and get ready for Future Card battles!
Source: crunchyroll

With the help of Baku Omori, a deck builder, and data analyst, Kuguru Uki, Gao gets a deck which he can fight with called "Dragon Blast Fury". At the prestigious fighting stage of Aibo Academy, Gao takes on Tasuku and his Buddy Monster, Jackknife Dragon.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ルミナイズ! 爆ドラ!!

REGULAR.description:
Forced to find a practice partner, Gao picks an unlikely opponent for his next Buddyfight. During the battle, an unexpected Buddy Monster arrives leaving everyone spellbound. Later, Gao upsets Drum and he threatens to reject Gao as his Buddy for good.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 悪魔と踊るファイター!

REGULAR.description:
Gao’s new friend, Kiri, learns about Buddyfighting, and takes part in an electrifying training session. Drum forgives Gao and helps him out of a tricky situation. The mysterious Buddyfighter Rouga reveals a dark power that may change Buddyfighting forever.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: トライアル! これがバディファイトだ!!

REGULAR.description:
Gao wanders off from his class during a fieldtrip and discovers something amazing. Drum learns that he can’t win every battle. Tasuku Ryuenji clashes with the villainous Buddyfighter Wolf, and realizes he needs some top-secret, Buddy Police technology.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: フューチャーフォース輝く!

REGULAR.description:
Rouga’s thirst for revenge takes him down an unexpected path. Baku puts his faith in Gao, and offers him a special gift. Gao temporarily loses sight of who he really is and takes an obsession too far without considering the consequences of his actions.
Source: crunchyroll

The annual Buddyfight tournament is approaching, and it has everyone buzzing. Noboru meets an unexpected ally. Tetsuya gets some creative help when he needs it most. And a tense disagreement between Gao and Baku leaves Koguru trying and pick up the pieces.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Deck Builder wa Shouri no Aibou!
デッキビルダーは勝利の相棒!

REGULAR.description:
Shido and Sophia are plotting something bad. Gao’s success in the Buddyfight arena is attracting negative attention from some middle school students. The ABC Cup qualifying round gets underway and there’s a surprising team moving on to the main event.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 最終予選, 突破せよ!

REGULAR.description:
Gao refuses help from Baku and Kuguru. Gao uses Drum’s keen sense of smell to track down a card thief and then challenges him to a Buddyfight. During the battle, Gao is forced to try something new, which teaches him a valuable lesson about friendship.
Source: crunchyroll

While everyone’s at the Aibo Buddy Cup bash, Noboru’s busy at Buddy Police HQ learning about Tasuku’s challenging past. Conflicted about his buddyfight future, Noboru is faced with a difficult challenge that eventually helps set him on a happier path.
Source: crunchyroll

The ABC Cup finally gets underway, but not before the principals of the elementary and middle schools get into a heated discussion. Gao and his team Balle du Soleil are drawn in the first match against the middle school, but where is their opponent?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Start of the Aibo Buddy Cup!
開幕! 相棒バディカップ!!

REGULAR.description:
Gao’s recruited by the Seifukai. Shido’s up to no good, working secretly behind the scenes to increase his chances of winning the ABC Cup. The second match of the tournament begins, pitting all-out strength against the time-honored art of ninja warfare.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Power vs. Ninja Arts! A Fierce Competition!
パワーvs忍法! 食うか斬られるか!?

REGULAR.description:
The fourth and final match of the ABC Cup’s first round gets underway between Jin and Tetsuya. Meanwhile, Tasuku and Jackknife have an out-of-this-world experience. And Shido is under pressure to find a replacement for Rouga and his powers of darkness.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 魂の絆! ドラゴニック・パニッシャー!!

REGULAR.description:
The final first round match of the ABC Cup begins between Noboru and Shido. And facing a difficult choice, Noboru gets some helpful advice from his Buddy El Quixote. Meanwhile Doai goes looking for Genma and finds more than he bargained for.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kedakaki Kokoro! Ryuukishi to Tomo ni!!
Noble Heart! Together with the Dragon Knight!
気高き心! 竜騎士と共に!!

REGULAR.description:
The gang finds out some upsetting news about Noboru just before his ABC Cup semifinal match against Gao. Angry and confused, Gao gives Noboru a piece of his mind during their heated battle, and we learn how the fighters really feel about each other.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dragons Duel! Journey of the Tiger!
Soshite Tora wa Senri o Kakeru!
そして虎は千里を駆ける!

REGULAR.description:
Zanya and Jin put it all on the line in a Katana World semifinal showdown hoping to advance to the ABC Cup main event. Gao and the gang search for Akatsuki, as he may hold a clue to Genma and Doai’s whereabouts. Sophia reveals a dark truth about herself.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mystique Explosion! The Great Katana World Battle!
秘技炸裂! カタナワールド大決戦!!

REGULAR.description:
The ABC Cup Final gets underway! Gao has a special surprise up his sleeve for his opponent Zanya, but it might just throw the whole tournament out of whack! Meanwhile, the gang goes searching for Genma and finds some assistance from an unlikely source
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ABC Cup Final! Exploring the Underground Maze!
ABC Cup Kesshou! Chika Meikyuu Daibouken!!
ABCカップ決勝! 地下迷宮大冒険!!

REGULAR.description:
Shido tries his best, but as expected, he’s no match for the more powerful Genma. Zanya gets his rematch with Genma and his amazing Buddy, Martial Arts Dragon Emperor Duel Sieger. This battle could go either way. It’s definitely one you won’t want to miss!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 脅威! デュエルズィーガー!!

REGULAR.description:
Gao receives a sentimental gift from his mother, and she agrees to become more involved in his Buddyfighting. Gao and Genma square off for an epic battle in Aibo’s newly renovated fighting stage arena. Who will be crowned the strongest fighter this year?
Source: crunchyroll

The showdown for the strongest fighter continues. Genma’s Buddy monster Duel Sieger demonstrates why he’s one of the most feared dragons that’s ever lived. Gao and Genma’s battle extends beyond the fighting stage over something that might surprise you.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kiseki o Yobu! Taiyou no Kobushi!!
奇跡を呼ぶ! 太陽のコブシ!!

REGULAR.description:
Kiri gives the gang a detailed video presentation on the various Buddyfight worlds, highlighting their strengths, powerful monsters and unique spells. Meanwhile, the Buddy Police is in trouble from a higher authority, which seems to be targeting Tasuku.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: バディモンスター大集合!

REGULAR.description:
The gang is invited to a ‘who’s who’ of Buddyfight parties onboard Kyoya Gaen’s luxury yacht. But before the festivities get going an Ultimate Rare card mysteriously disappears. Tasuku struggles with the terms of his suspension from the Buddy Police.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 悪魔の力! ディザスターフォース!!

REGULAR.description:
Drum returns to Dragon World, but doesn’t quite get the homecoming he was hoping for; his father sends him to a parallel world for some special training. Gao heads to Castle where he watches an exciting Buddyfight with a mysterious player called Wind.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yuusha wa Tsuraize! Drum no Daibouken!!
勇者はつらいぜ! ドラムの大冒険!!

REGULAR.description:
Gao and Kazane go head to head in a friendly battle on the Castle stage, and Kazane reveals her secret for why she chose to fight for Dungeon World. Feeling left out and unhappy about his Buddyfight abilities, Kiri finds some help from a shocking source.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ともだち100人! ダンジョンワールド!!

REGULAR.description:
To rescue Kiri, Gao and the gang take off for Sengoku Academy, located deep in the mysterious Chohakone mountains. They see a familiar face on the way and soon learn they must obey the strict traditions of the school if they hope to help their friend.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 地獄の学舎[まなびや]! 戦国学園!!

REGULAR.description:
In the quest to find Kiri, the heated showdown between Sengoku and Aibo continues. Genma squares off against a surprising foe who shares a secret with the Seifukai leader. A difference of opinion of what constitutes fair play has the Buddyfighters at odds.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: レジェンドワールドの挑戦!

REGULAR.description:
Kazane takes on Kemura, and we learn some secrets about the Frog-Man and Legend World. He is still reeling, however, from unwittingly using a Hate Card against Genma in his last match and needs a friendly boost to help him get his head back in the game.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 友達なら全力ファイト!

REGULAR.description:
Zanya meets his match when he squares off ninja-style with Kanahebi. A secret from the Kisaragi family’s past comes to the surface, and raises the stakes even higher. Time will tell which Katana World fighter is really living the dream!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ninja Taiketsu! Yume to Iu Na no Tsubasa!!
ニンジャ対決! 夢という名の翼!!

REGULAR.description:
Raremaro and Gao headline the fifth match, and let’s just say there’s a little magic in the air! Drum reveals new powers he developed during intensive training in other worlds, and Gao brings Axia off the bench to demonstrate his unusual abilities!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 決めろ! メガブラスト・バンカー!!

REGULAR.description:
Shosetsu Kirisame finally emerges from the shadows to enter the Buddyfight ring, determined to show Rouga what he’s made of. Gao and Drum set out on a mission for supplies and run into Sophia Sakharov, who seems to be on a mission of her own...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 無敵の剣士! 霧雨正雪!!

REGULAR.description:
Gao and Drum are MIA, and everyone’s worried they’ll lose their match against Shosetsu by default. Caught up in a new crowd and desperate for strength, Kiri is led down a confusing path. Drum has a major breakthrough at a crucial moment.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 牙王, バディスキル覚醒!

REGULAR.description:
Shosetsu falls prey to the Disaster Force, and struggles to claim the strength he seeks. Gao and the gang learn the hard way just how powerful the Dark Core can be, while Tasuku risks his spot on the Buddy Police force in order to protect the game he loves.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 最強! 王剣エクスカリバー!!

REGULAR.description:
Gao and Rouga square off for Kiri’s freedom, but not without a few fun twists thrown in by Gao for good measure. It’s a neck and neck battle that comes down to the tiniest of margins for the victor. And Tasuku’s fight for justice lands him in big trouble!
Source: crunchyroll

The gang watches a video of their triumph over the four demon generals at Sengoku Academy. Kiri challenges Gao to a Buddyfight to test out his new deck. But little do they know the Defenders of Darkness are watching their every move…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 闇の軍団! ディザスター!!

REGULAR.description:
Takihara and the Buddy Police face off against a menacing criminal fighter from another world. Some cool new monsters from Hero World arrive on the scene to help, but will Captain Answer come to the rescue?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 謎のヒーロー! キャプテン・アンサー!!

REGULAR.description:
It’s back to class for Gao and the gang, and it’s the school of hard knocks! Elf Kabala subs in to begin his undercover operation, and Principal Ikarino takes the class on a fieldtrip to a magical fighting stage to teach them some Buddyfighting truths.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 怒野校長の素敵なダンジョン!

REGULAR.description:
Gao and Drum put aside their differences to help Terumi Kuchinawa of the Disaster squad, who is sneaking around Aibo with a sinister plan. But when she runs into Asmodai and Tetsuya, things take an unexpected twist.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: メデューサを連れた女!

REGULAR.description:
The gang gets some new Buddycards, and Gao helps Kiri pick out a Special Rare! Soon after, Kiri receives a life-changing phone call but decides not to share the news with the others. Instead he decides to prove himself with a Buddyfight.
Source: crunchyroll

Gao receives a letter from Kiri that gives him and the gang quite a chill. They decide to pay Kiri a visit at his new school, but what they find there shocks them to the core! Gao is forced to face off against his old friend and the stakes are high!
Source: crunchyroll

"Disaster strikes twice for Gao and the gang! Shido and Davide wield the sinister powers of their new decks, built with cards from the mysterious Darkness Dragon World! 
Until now, this world was just a myth, but now its monsters are coming alive!"
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 恐怖! ダークネスドラゴンワールド!!

REGULAR.description:
Darkness Dragon World continues to mystify the Buddyfighting community, and the Buddy Police are brought up to speed. Gao and Davide have a showcase battle at the Buddy Fest that ends with a roaring finish! Meanwhile, Kiri is still missing…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 炸裂! 轟斬!! ガルガンチュア・パニッシャー!!

REGULAR.description:
The Grim Reaper is on the prowl and wreaking havoc! It appears as though no Buddy or Buddyfighter is safe! And with the Buddy Police’s hands tied, Zanya allows the gang to join him on his quest to capture this sinister villain.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 逢魔が刻に死神来たる

REGULAR.description:
Tasuku discovers some troubling news at Buddy Police Headquarters. He enlists Gao’s help to find the Grim Reaper and those responsible for supplying the Dark Core Deck Case. After learning of Disaster’s true intentions, they’ll be changed forever.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tasuku no Kakugo! Saraba Buddy Police!!
タスクの覚悟! さらばバディポリス!!

REGULAR.description:
Tasuku and Gao fight against the forces of darkness. The ex Buddy Cop surprises his opponents with Jackknife’s awesome abilities, and then is forced to make a difficult choice. With his Buddy on the line, Gao faces off against the Grim Reaper.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 2 Tai 1 no Death Match! Jack Chou Shinka!!
2対1のデスマッチ! ジャック超進化!!

REGULAR.description:
Elf Kabala demonstrates his control over some newly acquired Buddy monsters and challenges Gao to a Buddyfight showdown. Tsukikage has an out-of-body experience and surprises everyone when his special bond with Zanya is put to the test.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ルミナイズ! 爆竜牙!!

REGULAR.description:
The Gaen Cup tournament is building up steam, and several familiar Buddyfighters have been invited to take part. Will Gao choose to compete, knowing the dangers that Disaster has in store for him? And if so, who will be fighting on his team?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 誕生! 新生バルソレイユ!!

REGULAR.description:
The Buddyfight stage has been set, and the inaugural Gaen Cup is underway! But who’ll be competing first? Baku and Kuguru have their suspicions about Kyoya’s motives, but the gang is rallying to win it for Kiri.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 世紀の祭典! 臥炎カップ!!

REGULAR.description:
Love is in the air when Tetsuya dances his way onto the stage to fight with— and for— the girl of his dreams. We learn some secrets about a mysterious member of Team Goddess, and Kyoya deals with his doubts about a member of Disaster
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Dancing Demon Takes on Medusa!
ダンシングファイト! 魔王vsメデューサ

REGULAR.description:
Baku has a trip down memory lane that leaves him struggling with his loyalties. Team Goddess surprises everyone by sending out a unexpected fighter for the round one finals. Can Gao defeat someone who knows his every move?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: なななんと! 実況ファイト!!

REGULAR.description:
After Shido and Davide make quick work of the Kanme brothers, Team Purgatory takes the stage against Team Sengoku Academy. During the match, Kyoya reveals a few surprises about Darkness Dragon World and the Dark Core Decks that leaves everyone in awe.
Source: crunchyroll

We learn Kyoya’s motivations for sponsoring the Gaen Cup Tournament. Kiri wakes up in hospital and immediately sets out to realize a mysterious plan of his own. And some familiar faces return to Aibo, but something is noticeably different about them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaette Kita Tora! Sono Tatakai wa Destiny!!
帰ってきた虎! その闘いはデスティニー!!

REGULAR.description:
Everything goes haywire when Drum’s father shows up from Dragon World. Hoping to teach their sons a lesson, Takashi Mikado and Fang Slade the Thirteenth join forces against Gao and Drum in a family Buddyfight showdown!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chichi ni Nozome! Drum Breaker Dragon!
父に挑め! ドラムブレイカー・ドラゴン!

REGULAR.description:
The first semi-final gets underway! The opening game in the best-of-three showdown is between Noboru and the mysterious Purgatory Knight… but there’s something familiar about him, and our gang thinks they’ve figured out his true identity!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 絶無の剣! ディストーション・パニッシャー!!

REGULAR.description:
Everyone’s still reeling from Tasuku’s surprising defection to Disaster, even after he explains why. Rouga and Jin face off in the second game of their semi-final showdown. Gao finds out the real reason why Team Destiny entered the tournament.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ookami vs Kitsune! Sore wa Otoko-tachi no Ketsui!!
Wolf Versus Fox! A Battle of Instinct!
狼vs狐! それは男たちの決意!!

REGULAR.description:
Building tensions threaten to break up Team Balle du Soleil when Baku’s big secret is revealed. Tetsuya decides to take matters into his own hands and makes a performance out of his fight with Davide. Then Zanya faces off against Shido.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tetsuya Koritsu Muen! Balle du Soleil Houkai!?
テツヤ孤立無援! バルソレイユ崩壊!?

REGULAR.description:
Gremlin’s true colors shine through during the semi-finals when he plays an epic tie-breaking game against Gao. Will Team Balle du Soleil move on to the Gaen Cup finals, or will it be the devious Team Darkness Masterminds?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Master Versus Apprentice! Death Tallica and Explosive Dragon Fang!
Shitei Taiketsu! Death Tallica vs Bakuryuu Kiba!!
師弟対決! デスタリカvs爆竜牙!!

REGULAR.description:
Commander I, Takihara and Stella interrupt Shido’s pity-party to initiate their plan to regain control of the corrupt Buddy Police. But when things go awry, it’s up to Genma to step in and set things straight before Disaster strikes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: バディポリス奪還作戦!

REGULAR.description:
The Gaen Cup final round gets underway, but not without some pre-fight drama! Sophia confronts Tetsuya and presents him with an unexpected offer. Meanwhile, Baku and Kuguru go through some unusual fight prep strategy with the team.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gaen Cup Final Round! Tetsuya`s Choice!
Gaen Cup Kesshou! Tetsuya no Sentaku!!
臥炎カップ決勝! テツヤの選択!!

REGULAR.description:
Police Commissioner Kisaragi comes to watch Zanya and Rouga fight it out in the second game of the Gaen Cup finals. During the back-and-forth battle, Rouga opens up about his dark past and Zanya helps him shed some light on all things good and bad.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ロウガ, 友情に散る!!

REGULAR.description:
The final, tiebreaking game of the Gaen Cup between Gao and Tasuku gets underway. Gao is still confident he can help his friend see the error of his ways. Meanwhile, Takihara and Stella go on a special mission and find a big surprise waiting for them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 龍炎寺タスクvs未門牙王

REGULAR.description:
With many surprising twists and turns, the deciding game of the Gaen Cup finals is decided. The truth about Kyoya’s diabolical plan is revealed. Monsters from Darkness Dragon World begin traversing through the mysterious portal and descend to Earth.
Source: crunchyroll

The countdown to the battle for Earth is on. With most of the planet duped by Kyoya, children everywhere are frantic to get their hands on a Dark Core Deck Case replica. Gao helps old friends reunite, and gets some support from an unlikely source.
Source: crunchyroll

The odds are in favor of Kyoya Gaen and his master plan. Only Gao Mikado stands in his way…but will he stay standing? True to form, Kyoya unveils a few surprises that leave Gao and the gang in disbelief. This is a battle you won’t want to miss!
Source: crunchyroll

The battle to save Earth is on, and Kyoya’s pulling out all the stops. Will his incredible Aqulta Gwaneff, A.K.A The Sword of Truth, be too much for Gao to handle? Or will the Mighty Sun Fighter overcome the odds and save the planet from a monster invasion?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 放て! フューチャーカード!!
Zen`in Shuugou! 11 Nin no Buddy Fighter!!
全員集合! 11人のバディファイター!!

WIKIPEDIA_JP: フューチャーカード_バディファイト

titles.title: フューチャーカード バディファイト
